name: UpdateAirtableFieldDetails
description:
Updates the name or description of an Airtable field.

This tool updates the name and/or description of a specified field in an Airtable base. It requires at least one of the name or description to be provided. Use this when you need to change field metadata in Airtable.

parameters.name: airtable_base_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Airtable base containing the field to update.

parameters.name: airtable_table_id
parameters.description: The ID of the table in which the field's metadata is to be updated.

parameters.name: field_column_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the field (column) to be updated in the Airtable base.

parameters.name: new_field_description
parameters.description: The new description for the field. Optional, max 20,000 characters.

value_schema.description: The new description for the field (optional). If present, must be a string no longer than 20,000 characters.

parameters.name: new_field_name
parameters.description: The new name for the field in Airtable. This is optional but must be provided if no new description is given.

value_schema.description: The new name for the field (optional).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description for the field (optional). If present, must be a string no longer than 20,000 characters.

value_schema.description: The new description for the field (optional). If present, must be a string no longer than 20,000 characters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the field (optional).

value_schema.description: The new name for the field (optional).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
